1.query: SELECT Customers.CustomerName, COUNT(Orders.OrderID) AS TotalOrders FROM Orders JOIN Customers ON Orders.CustomerID = Customers.CustomerID GROUP BY Customers.CustomerName ORDER BY TotalOrders DESC LIMIT 10;
1.title: Top 10 Customers by Number of Orders

2.query: SELECT strftime('%Y-%m', Orders.OrderDate) AS Month, SUM(OrderDetails.Quantity * Products.Price) AS Revenue FROM Orders JOIN OrderDetails ON Orders.OrderID = OrderDetails.OrderID JOIN Products ON OrderDetails.ProductID = Products.ProductID GROUP BY Month ORDER BY Month;
2.title: Monthly Revenue Trend
